content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the district court in ljubljana the case involved a dispute over the payment of costs the procedure lasted for 1 year 2 months and 29 days starting on february 15 2018 and ending on may 13 2019 the final resolution of the lawsuit resulted in the division of goods between the expartners the total value of the goods in question is 65000 eur which includes two real estate properties the plaintiff will receive 10000 eur while the defendant will receive the real estate properties the decision was made based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the details of the court settlement are confidential and there is no available translation of the document
